content:
Here's the updated list:

**Purchase #1: ASOS (22nd)**

* Date: 22nd
* Store: ASOS
* Items purchased: 3 dresses, 1 pair of boots
* Total cost: $120 (after 20% discount)
* Promo code used: 20% off

**Purchase #2: Amazon (10th last month)**

* Date: 10th (last month)
* Store: Amazon
* Items purchased: Laptop bag
* Total cost: $40

Total spend so far: $120 + $40 = $160

I've added the laptop bag purchase to the list and included it in the total spend. Now, you can easily keep track of your online purchases and total spend over time.

Feel free to add more purchases as you make them, and I'll be happy to help you keep your list up to date!
